channel.title: Indie on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in Indie on Ian Wootten

item.title: Where does Steam store Indie Game The Movie?
item.description: A quickie – but for all those that have downloaded “Indie Game the Movie” today from steam and are wondering where the video files are stored, you can find them here: Steam/SteamApps/common/Indie Game The Movie/data/movies
